TEXT.TITLE: NEW ZEALAND GOVERNMENT BORROWS 100 MLN STERLING
TEXT.BODY: The New Zealand government borrowed 100 mln stg on the Eurosterling market to refinance a loan of the same amount maturing in June, Finance Minister Roger Douglas said in a statement. The coupon rate is 9.62 pct and the loan life is eight years. Douglas said the coupon rate is the lowest obtained by the government on a sterling loan since 1971. REUTER
